help.embed.title: ğŸ¤– Bot Help & Tutorials
help.embed.description:
Here you can find all features explained.

Command: `/help`
Aliases: `/tutorial`, `/hilfe`
help.section.level_system.title: ğŸ† Level System
help.section.level_system.body:
**How does it work?**
â€¢ You gain XP by chatting and voice chat
â€¢ Higher levels give roles & rewards

**Commands:**
`/rank` â†’ Shows your progress
`/leaderboard` â†’ Server leaderboard
help.section.polls.title: ğŸ“Š Polls
help.section.polls.body:
**Create polls for the server**

`/poll <question>`
â¡ Example:
`/poll Do you like pizza?`
help.section.birthdays.title: ğŸ‚ Birthdays
help.section.birthdays.body:
**Save your birthday**

`/birthday <DD.MM>`
â¡ The bot will remind automatically
help.section.earn_xp.title: â­ Earn XP
help.section.earn_xp.body:
You gain XP by:
â€¢ Sending messages
â€¢ Voice chat time
â€¢ Unlocking achievements
help.section.achievements.title: ğŸ… Achievements
help.section.achievements.body:
Achievements are milestones you can unlock.

Examples:
â€¢ Sending many messages
â€¢ Staying long in voice chat
â€¢ Reaching high levels
help.section.general.title: âš™ General
help.section.general.body:
`/ping` â†’ Tests if the bot is online
`/help` â†’ Shows this menu
`/tutorial` / `/hilfe` â†’ Aliases for help
`/admin_help` â†’ Opens admin command center
help.section.misc.title: ğŸ§ª Misc & Fun
help.section.misc.body:
`/insult <name>` â†’ Fun: insult someone
`/secretinsult <name>` â†’ Send an insult but replies ephemeral
help.section.counting.title: ğŸ”¢ Counting
help.section.counting.body:
`/countstats` â†’ Show counting channel statistics
`/counttop` â†’ Show counting leaderboard
help.section.tickets.title: ğŸ« Tickets
help.section.tickets.body: `/ticket` â€” Open a private support ticket (or use the ticket panel posted by staff)
help.section.tempvoice.title: ğŸ™ï¸ TempVoice
help.section.tempvoice.body:
Create temporary voice channels automatically.

- Join the configured TempVoice create channel
- The bot creates your own channel and moves you there
- Channel is deleted automatically when everyone leaves
- Management is done via TempVoice panel buttons posted by admins (lock/unlock, hide/unhide, rename, limit, transfer, claim, delete)
help.section.music.title: ğŸµ Music
help.section.music.body:
Play music from YouTube or import Spotify tracks/playlists.

`/join` â†’ Bot joins your voice channel
`/play <query|YouTube URL>` â†’ Play or search YouTube
`/skip` â†’ Skip current track
`/queue` â†’ Show queue
`/now` â†’ Show now playing
`/stop` â†’ Stop and clear queue
`/spotify <url> [max_tracks]` â†’ Import Spotify track or playlist into the queue.

help.section.memes.title: ğŸ˜‚ Memes
help.section.memes.body:
Create and save memes from images or GIFs with your own captions.

`/meme create <name> <caption>` â†’ Post an image/GIF and add a caption
`/meme show <name>` â†’ Show a saved meme
`/meme list` â†’ List all memes
`/meme delete <name>` â†’ Delete a meme (Admin)
meme.error.no_image: âŒ Please attach an image or GIF.
meme.list.title: ğŸ˜‚ Meme Collection
help.section.membercount.title: ğŸ‘¥ Member Count
help.section.membercount.body:
A voice channel that automatically displays the current number of server members.

This feature is configured by admins via the setup wizard.
membercount.msg.set: âœ… Member count channel set to {channel}.
membercount.error.no_channel: âŒ No member count channel configured.
